changes: Commands for seeing your stats (kills, deaths, wins, losses, etc...)
Base stamina reduced by 30%, no more dodge spam!
Players can not get stuck on different maps anymore
New sounds for bows, crossbows, rolling

Insane performance changes (Signs, decorated pots, banners, campfires, levers etc... decrease FPS DRASTICALLY, we removed all of them resulting in more than 10x performance increase!! Just for reference, I have an RTX 3070 and I used to have 70 FPS on the smallest map, now I have 500!!)
Sea King only available on Blue team, only on Red
Gunslinger ammo recharges on kill with sword, added damage falloff
Shinobi slight health regen when ender pearl used
Players now teleport to random locations in the class selection lobby (to give other players a chance to play popular classes)
impact guard now blocks 50% of incoming damage instead of 80% (arrows, tridents, explosions, magic)
Parrying much more useful, however penalty is much higher (fail to parry twice and you will be guard broken)
Players automatically spectate if they rejoin while dead
Set class randomly if no class picked
You can now drop arrows (pick up enemy arrows and give them to your teammates!)
Fixed items not being given to players sometimes
Chat shows which map you're playing on
We changed every passive skill, all players have the same stamina regen
more random spots so players don't spawn in the same place
